title: Can we do good by being evil? - Quora

response.answer_text: Good and evil is a very difficult thing. Something that is good for a person may well hurt for another person. There have been many choices politically and in humanly that have been done with good intentions but have ended up hurting many people. I think we should always just strive to do something good, sometimes good intentions just become bad. that is a part of life. https://apoemstory.com
I dunno what you consider evil. For me no, but even from evil good comes of it. What we do isn’t really evil or good usually, that.s my opinion. The results are.
